title: Banner
description: Banner information on street light poles

PoleID.description: The unique identifier of the pole

Status.description: The status of the banner, eg E, H

InstallationDate.description: The date the banner was installed

LocationOnPole.description: A numerical value representing the location on the pole

BannerSize.description: The size of the banner eg. 24in X 72in

BracketType.description: The type of bracket used for mounting the banner

MountType.description: The type of mount used for mounting the banner

GeneralComment.description: A general comment on the banner

ReferencePicture.description: A url leading to a picture of reference for the banner
